Ratio

Class Ratio_Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ratio.Ratio_Point

  • public class Ratio_Point
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a ratio point. Including x ratio that tells me the ratio of the x coordinate from the left side (left/full_width), and y ratio that tells me the ratio of the y coordinate from the top down (top/full_height).
    Author:
    Eitan Lichtman, Netanel Indik
